cumulated.origin: |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wfun(c0)), wa(wbr(c2, cfsupp, c3), wss(co(c0, csupp, c3), co(c2, csupp, c3)))), wbr(c0, cfsupp, c3))

comment: If the support of a function is a subset of the support of a finitely supported function, the function is finitely supported. (Contributed by AV, 2-Jul-2019.) (Proof shortened by AV, 15-Jul-2019.)
